all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And now, verily, verily, I say unto thee, put your trust in that Spirit which leadeth to do good—yea, to do justly, to walk humbly, to judge righteously; and this is my Spirit.
Doctrine and Covenants 11:12
Quote of the Day
"We find in Easter in Jesus Christ peace, becoming, and belonging—that which is enduringly real and joyful, happy and forever."
Elder Gerrit W. Gong | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
